description: The CompSource Mutual Endowed Scholarship is open to declared Insurance & Risk Management majors that meet the following eligibility requirements: Eligibility Requirements Declared Insurance & Risk Management majors Minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA Must have completed at least 12 hours at the time of application U.S. citizen Selection Process Preference will be given to Oklahoma residents, and incoming sophomores or juniors Award Requirements Once the recipient receives the scholarship they will continue to hold the scholarship for a maximum of three years, or until graduation, whichever comes first, provided the following criteria are met: Student maintains 3.0 cumulative GPA Student continues to make progress toward a degree in Insurance & Risk Management
